ygData.subject: Re: LvL 20-24
ygData.msgSnippet: Undead reavers are after zoning from NK over wooden bridge into EK hang a right and there is a hill after a short bit full of them. Be careful as thee are alot
ygData.messageBody:
Undead reavers are after zoning from NK over wooden bridge into EK hang a
right and there is a hill after a short bit full of them. Be careful as thee
are alot of HG about sometimes and cyclops. They should be easy for you.
Also in this zone as someone has mentioned are gorge hounds not too hard and
Crag Spiders. Crags are tough and have nasty poison. carrions might be
better to start with but a crag if you root , blast, melee and leave enough
to cure the poison after should be ok too and great xp just pull them to the
river bank as the lions have a massive agro radius if you try and med here.

South Karanas has alot of soloable stuff as does Rathe mountains, or the
ultra boring and penniless way (you will be poor as wehn you started with
this one) Oasis. Pick dry bones off as well as crypt mummies DW caimans and
crocodiles.

Twylork

P.s. if your really lucky and brave an Eye might show that is why when in
this zone prot vs magic and poison are essential latter for spiders
obviously.
